description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.37tJXZ0coihNI3BI]{Star Knight}

You have learned to use the strong plates and defensive abilities of your heavy armor to protect your weapon. When wearing heavy armor or powered armor, you gain a +4 bonus to your KAC against @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#disarm]{disarm} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#sunder]{sunder} combat maneuvers. You lose this bonus whenever you make a full attack, as it is impossible to protect your weapons while doing so.

modifiers.name: Guarded Attack (Ex)
modifiers.notes: When wearing heavy armor or powered armor, you gain a +4 bonus to your KAC against disarm and sunder combat maneuvers. You lose this bonus whenever you make a full attack, as it is impossible to protect your weapons while doing so.
